CLEAN THIS, CLEAN THAT When you play this character, you may shuffle all Broom cards from your discard into your deck.
flavor_text: Super-speedy tidiness.

name: Magic Broom
text: CLEAN SWEEP While this character is at a location, it gets +2 {S}.
flavor_text: Super-sized tidiness.

name: Magic Carpet
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
FIND THE WAY {E} — Move a character of yours to a location for free.
flavor_text:
"Carpet and I can swoop in, grab the lore, and be back
before anyone knows it!" —Aladdin

name: Magica De Spell
Magica De Spell
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Magica De Spell.)
ALL MINE Whenever this character quests, gain lore equal to the cost of one of your items in play.
flavor_text:
"I can feel my powers growing the closer I get to
Scrooge's precious dime!"

name: Magica De Spell
text: TELEKINESIS {E} — Return chosen item with cost equal to or less than this character's {S} to its player's hand.
flavor_text: "Do you know what I call this? A good start!"

name: Maleficent
text:
DARK KNOWLEDGE Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card.
DIVINATION During your turn, whenever you draw a card, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

name: Mama Odie
text: LISTEN TO YOUR MAMA NOW Whenever this character quests, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.
flavor_text: "That's the way to give it what it needs, Juju!"

name: Pua
text: ALWAYS THERE When this character is banished, you may shuffle this card into your deck.
flavor_text: Always ready to lend a hand...er, snout.

name: Rafiki
text:
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {S}.)
ANCIENT SKILLS Whenever he challenges a Hyena character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.
flavor_text: Mind the stick!

name: Stratos
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
CYCLONE {E} — Gain lore equal to the number of Titan characters you have in play.
flavor_text: "Blow Zeus away!"

name: The Firebird
flavor_text:
It rages through the forest,
Wings spread wide with flame
Spring sings its ancient chorus
And green renews its claim

name: The Queen
flavor_text:
"A cobweb's strand to hold her fast
An eagle's eye to see her well
Sands of time to steal her past
Thus I cast my magic spell!"

name: Treasure Guardian
text: WHO DISTURBS MY SLUMBER? This character can't challenge or quest unless it is at a location.
flavor_text: "Only one may enter here."

name: Ursula
text: YOU'RE TOO LATE Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.
flavor_text: The secret contract has already been written.

name: Bestow a Gift
text: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.
flavor_text:
"From magic ink I call this gift.
Fly my minion, thy wings be swift!"
—Maleficent

name: It Calls Me
text:
(A character with cost 1 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Draw a card. Then, choose up to 3 cards from chosen opponent's discard and shuffle them into their deck.
flavor_text: I am everything I've learned and more

name: Last-Ditch Effort
text: Exert chosen opposing character. Then chosen character of yours gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)
flavor_text: "I got your back."

name: The Boss is on a Roll
text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of them on the top or the bottom of your deck in any order. Gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: Go ahead! Make your choice!

name: The Lamp
text: GOOD OR EVIL Banish this item — If you have a character named Jafar in play, draw 2 cards. If you have a character named Genie in play, return chosen character with cost 4 or less to their player's hand.

name: The Sorcerer's Hat
text: INCREDIBLE ENERGY {E}, 1 {I} — Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.
flavor_text:
Minnie approached it cautiously. Whoever had placed it here
might have prepared traps.

name: Forbidden Mountain
flavor_text:
An eerie quiet surrounds the castle—but beware of the dangerous
occupant within.

name: The Queen's Castle
text: USING THE MIRROR At the start of your turn, for each character you have here, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: Those who visit the mirror can choose their question—but not the answer.

name: The Sorcerer's Tower
text:
BROOM CLOSET Your characters named Magic Broom may move here for free.
MAGICAL POWER Characters get +1 {L} while here.
flavor_text: Everything you need to make some magic.

name: Cubby
text: THE BEAR Whenever this character moves to a location, he gets +3 {S} this turn.
flavor_text:
With Peter holding off Hook, Cubby did what he
does best: break stuff.

name: Cursed Merfolk
text: POOR SOULS Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.
flavor_text:
"Now it's happened once or twice, someone couldn't
pay the price..."
—Ursula

name: Don Karnage
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text:
"You didn't expect to find me here, did you? Well
neither did I."

name: Flotsam
text: EERIE PAIR Your characters named Jetsam get +3 {S}.
flavor_text: "Ursula needs lore to complete her plan...."

name: Friar Tuck
text: YOU THIEVING SCOUNDREL When you play this character, the player or players with the most cards in their hand chooses and discards a card.
flavor_text: "Get outta my church! Out! Out! Out!"

name: Helga Sinclair
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Helga Sinclair.)
THIS CHANGES EVERYTHING Whenever this character quests, you may deal 3 damage to chosen damaged character.

name: Helga Sinclair
text: NOTHING PERSONAL When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.
flavor_text: "You said we were in this together!"

name: Jetsam
text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
EERIE PAIR Your characters named Flotsam gain Ward.
flavor_text: "There must be powerful lore here, very powerful."

name: Kit Cloudkicker
text: SKYSURFING When you play this character, you may return chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less to their player's hand.
flavor_text:
"It's been fun, guys, but I got to be going.
Yahoooo!"

name: Lyle Tiberius Rourke
text:
WELL, NOW YOU KNOW When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)
THANKS FOR VOLUNTEERING Whenever one of your other characters is banished, each opponent loses 1 lore.

name: Milo Thatch
flavor_text:
"Believe me, studying gibberish really can take
you places!"

name: Milo Thatch
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Milo Thatch.)
TAKE THEM BY SURPRISE When this character is banished, return all opposing characters to their players' hands.
flavor_text: "You don't know what you're tampering with."

name: Morph
text: MIMICRY You may play any character with Shift on this character as if this character had any name.
flavor_text:
"You jiggle-headed blob of mischief!"
—John Silver

name: Peter Pan
text: I CAME TO LISTEN TO THE STORIES Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain lore equal to that location's {L}.
flavor_text:
The Illumineers needed someone to find a missing
spellbook, and Peter was the first to volunteer.

name: Prince John
text: COLLECT TAXES Whenever this character quests, each opponent with more lore than you loses 2 lore.
flavor_text:
"Too late to be known as John the First, he's sure to
be known as John the Worst!"
—Sheriff of Nottingham

name: Robin Hood
flavor_text:
"Some days, it's nice to let the river do the
running."

name: Shenzi
text:
I'LL HANDLE THIS While this character is at a location, she gets +3 {S}.
WHAT'S THE HURRY? While this character is at a location, whenever she challenges another character, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "Why not stick around for dinner?"

name: Sir Hiss
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: Prince John isn't the only one collecting "taxes"

name: Skippy
text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavor_text: Even the bravest outlaw knows when to lie low.

name: Starkey
flavor_text: Point him in the right direction, and he'll do the rest.

name: Stitch
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
HIDE While this character is at a location, he gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
flavor_text: For such a flashy dresser, he sure is hard to spot.

name: Ursula
text: YOU'LL NEVER EVEN MISS IT When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a song card of your choice.

name: Ursula
text: WHAT A DEAL Whenever this character sings a song, you may play that song again from your discard for free, then put it on the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text: "I don't want much—just the most powerful lore!"

name: Wildcat
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
DISASSEMBLE {E} — Banish chosen item.
flavor_text: "I can take anything apart in under five minutes!"

name: Zazu
text: IT'S TIME TO GO! While this character is at a location, he gets +1 {L}.
flavor_text:
"I'd be lyin' if I said I ran the place, but welcome to
the Pride Lands all the same!"

name: Has Set My Heaaaaaaart . . .
text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Banish chosen item.
flavor_text:
He's not real smart
And yet, he's touched my little cowhide heart

name: I Will Find My Way
text:
(A character with cost 1 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character of yours gets +2 {S} this turn. They may move to a location for free.
flavor_text:
I would go most anywhere
To feel like I belong

name: Strike a Good Match
text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.
flavor_text:
Please bring honor to us
Please bring honor to us all

name: Airfoil
text: I GOT TO BE GOING {E} — If you've played 2 or more actions this turn, draw a card.
flavor_text: Discovered in the lost Sea Duck, it looked good as new.

name: Robin's Bow
text:
FOREST'S GIFT {E} — Deal 1 damage to chosen damaged character or location.
A BIT OF A LARK Whenever a character of yours named Robin Hood quests, you may ready this item.
flavor_text:
"The forest always provides just what you need."
—Robin Hood

name: Starlight Vial
text:
EFFICIENT ENERGY {E} — You pay 2 {I} less for the next action you play this turn.
TRAP 2 {I}, Banish this item — Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.
flavor_text: In the wrong hands, this vial of magic could be disastrous.

name: De Vil Manor
flavor_text:
"They say the ol' place is haunted, or bewitched, or some such fiddle-faddle."
—Colonel

name: Fang
text: SURROUNDED BY WATER Characters gain Ward and Evasive while here. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge. Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
flavor_text: A nation protected by fierce assassins and their even fiercer cats.

name: Kuzco's Palace
text: CITY WALLS Whenever a character is challenged and banished while here, banish the challenging character.
flavor_text: "Sure it's a little small, but also it DOESN'T HAVE A POOL!" —Kuzco

name: Ariel
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
INSPIRING VOICE Whenever you play a song, chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn.
flavor_text: Shipwrecks are great places to find lore—and hide from sharks!

name: Billy Bones
flavor_text:
"He's after me chest, that fiendish cyborg and his
band of cutthroats."

name: Captain Hook
text:
NEMESIS During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.
MAN-TO-MAN Characters named Peter Pan lose Evasive and can't gain Evasive.

name: Della Duck
text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
flavor_text:
"I survived the moon. How tough could the flooded
Inklands be?"

name: HeiHei
text: MINDLESS WANDERING Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavor_text: Considering the coconut.

name: Hydra
text: WATCH THE TEETH Whenever this character is dealt damage, deal that much damage to chosen opposing character.
flavor_text: More heads are better than one.

name: Jim Hawkins
text:
THIS IS IT! When you play this character, you may play a location with cost 4 or less for free.
TAKE THE HELM Whenever you play a location, this character may move there for free.
flavor_text:
"You're gonna rattle the stars, you are."
—John Silver

name: Jim Hawkins
flavor_text:
If you want a bigger reward, you've got to take
bigger risks.

name: Kakamora
text: PLUNDER When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.
flavor_text: There's a bunch more where he came from.

name: Madame Medusa
text: THAT TERRIBLE WOMAN When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 3 {S} or less.
flavor_text:
"Finding lore will be as easy as taking candy from
children."

name: Maui
text:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
IN MA BELLY Whenever a character of yours named HeiHei quests, this character gets +1 {L} and loses Reckless this turn.
flavor_text: "You got any more of those chickens hanging around?"

name: Maui
text:
THIS MISSION IS CURSED This character can't ready at the start of your turn.
I GOT YOUR BACK 2 {I} — Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: Always ready to make a splash.

name: Milo Thatch
text: I'M YOUR MAN! While this character is at a location, he gets +2 {S}.
flavor_text: "My grandpa never told me about this place!"

name: Moana
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.)
WELCOME TO MY BOAT Whenever this character quests while at a location, ready all other characters here. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

name: Moana
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: No fire or storm will keep her from her goal.

name: Nutsy
flavor_text:
"Nutsy, button your beak."
—Trigger

name: Peter Pan
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
OVER HERE, TINK While you have a character named Tinker Bell in play, this character gets +2 {S}.
flavor_text:
With Peter, plans often meant diving headlong into
danger.

name: Peter Pan
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Peter Pan.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
YOU'RE NEXT! Whenever he challenges a Pirate character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.

name: Prince Eric
text: SURPRISE MANEUVER When this character is banished, you may banish chosen character.
flavor_text:
The storm came out of nowhere, forcing Eric
to turn back before he reached the mysterious
structure at the edge of Lorcana.

name: Scroop
text: BRUTE While this character has damage, he gets +3 {S}.
flavor_text:
Always keep him in front of you. And downwind,
if possible.

name: Simba
flavor_text:
He'll join the hunt for lore after he's had a quick
snack.

name: Slightly
text:
THE FOX If you have a character named Peter Pan in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: "Pirates sure are easy to trick!"

name: Stitch
text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavor_text:
"Who thought giving him power armor was a
good idea?!"
—Nani

name: Trigger
text: OLD BETSY Your characters named Nutsy get +1 {L}.
flavor_text:
"Criminently, Trigger! Point that peashooter the
other way."
—Sheriff of Nottingham

name: Webby Vanderquack
flavor_text:
"Finding lore is a lot easier when you have a
grappling hook!"

name: Divebomb
text: Banish one of your characters with Reckless to banish chosen character with less {S} than that character.

name: I've Got a Dream
text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Ready chosen character of yours at a location. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. Gain lore equal to that location's {L}.
flavor_text:
Tor would like to quit and be a florist
Gunther does interior design

name: On Your Feet! Now!
text: Ready all your characters and deal 1 damage to each of them. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: "Catch them! Before they get away!"

name: Voyage
text: Move up to 2 characters of yours to the same location for free.
flavor_text: "We were voyagers! Why'd we stop?" —Moana

name: Maui's Fish Hook
text:
IT'S MAUI TIME! If you have a character named Maui in play, you may use this item's Shapeshift ability for free.
SHAPESHIFT {E}, 2 {I} — Choose one:
• Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
• Chosen character gets +3 {S} this turn.

name: Sumerian Talisman
text: SOURCE OF MAGIC During your turn, whenever one of your characters is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Summoned spirit from the dark
Show thyself before this arc."
—Lena Sabrewing

name: Agrabah
flavor_text:
"Welcome to Agrabah, city of mystery, of enchantment, and the finest
merchandise this side of the river."
—Merchant

name: Jolly Roger
text:
LOOK ALIVE, YOU SWABS! Characters gain Rush while here. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
ALL HANDS ON DECK! Your Pirate characters may move here for free.

name: RLS Legacy
text:
THIS IS OUR SHIP Characters gain Evasive while here. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
HEAVE TOGETHER NOW If you have a character here, you pay 2 {I} less to move a character of yours here.

name: Audrey Ramirez
text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
SPARE PARTS Whenever this character quests, ready one of your items.
flavor_text: "How'd you break this thing, anyway?"

name: Captain Amelia
text: DISCIPLINE During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
flavor_text:
"I've spotted a strange structure on the horizon.
Hard to port, helmsman!"

name: Dewey
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text: "I got it! I knew I could do it! Dewey for the win!"

name: Flintheart Glomgold
text: THEY'LL NEVER SEE IT COMING! During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
flavor_text: "Nobody tells Flintheart Glomgold what to do!"

name: Genie
flavor_text:
"Ten thousand years will give you such a crick in
the neck!"

name: Gramma Tala
text: THERE WAS ONLY OCEAN When you play this character, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put one into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavor_text:
Listen with your whole heart, and the ancestors will
guide you.

name: Gramma Tala
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Gramma Tala.)
DO YOU KNOW WHO YOU ARE? Whenever a card is put into your inkwell, gain 1 lore.
flavor_text:
She will always be with you, no matter how far your
journey takes you.

name: Gyro Gearloose
text: NOW TRY TO KEEP UP {E} — Put an item card from your discard on the top of your deck.
flavor_text: "Maybe the bulb tech will be less evil this time..."

name: Huey
text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
THREE NEPHEWS Whenever this character quests, if you have characters named Dewey and Louie in play, you may draw 3 cards.
flavor_text: "This looks like part of a larger crystal!"

name: King Louie
flavor_text:
"Hold up, cuz. Why not sit back and enjoy some
sweet beats?"

name: Kit Cloudkicker
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kit Cloudkicker.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

name: Kit Cloudkicker
text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
flavor_text:
Thrilled to have his airfoil back, he launched into
the Inklands.

name: Louie
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text: "Found the last one!"

name: Maid Marian
text: HIGHBORN LADY When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: She makes every space more beautiful.

name: Mama Odie
text: THIS GOING TO BE GOOD Whenever you play a song, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: "You dig a little deeper, you'll find everything you need."

name: Pluto
flavor_text:
Pluto's job was to keep Gustav's attention so
Minnie could get to the cave.

name: Rufus
text: TOO OLD TO BE CHASING MICE When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: "Faith is a bluebird you see from afar."

name: Scrooge McDuck
text:
I'M GOING HOME! During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
I DIDN'T GET RICH BY BEING STUPID During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may play an item for free.
flavor_text: He can make money anywhere.

name: Scrooge McDuck
text: TREASURE FINDER Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {I} less for the next item you play this turn.
flavor_text:
A strange new world is the perfect place to make a
strange new fortune!

name: The Queen
text: CALCULATING AND VAIN Whenever this character quests, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.
flavor_text:
She has only one question, and she'd better like
the answer.

name: Tinker Bell
text: I CAN USE THAT Whenever one of your items is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: She lives in a world of possibilities.

name: Wendy Darling
text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

name: Distract
text: Chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn. Draw a card.

name: Friend Like Me
text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Each player puts the top 3 cards of their deck into their inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: You got some power in your corner now

name: How Far I'll Go
text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Repair
text: Remove up to 3 damage from one of your locations or characters.
flavor_text:
"I'm thinkin' about opening a shop here. What do you
think?"

name: Aurelian Gyrosensor
text: SEEKING KNOWLEDGE Whenever one of your characters quests, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text:
"It can point you toward lost lore, but if you're not careful,
it'll lead you off a cliff."
—Venturo, an Illumineer

name: Heart of Te Fiti
text: CREATE LIFE {E}, 2 {I} — Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: It takes a pure heart to calm the raging storm within.

name: Lucky Dime
text: NUMBER ONE {E}, 2 {I} — Choose a character of yours and gain lore equal to their {L}.
flavor_text: This one simple coin changed Scrooge's life forever.

name: Scrooge's Top Hat
text: BUSINESS EXPERTISE {E} — You pay 1 {I} less for the next item you play this turn.
flavor_text: Just the thing to top off another brilliant deal.

name: Vault Door
text: SEALED AWAY Your locations and characters at locations gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
flavor_text:
Only Scrooge knows about this vault. And he's going to
keep it that way.

name: Belle's House
text: LABORATORY If you have a character here, you pay 1 {I} less to play items.
flavor_text: Some of the most important tools in Lorcana are crafted here.

name: McDuck Manor
flavor_text:
"It's only the coolest home in Lorcana!"
—Webby Vanderquack

name: Motunui
text: REINCARNATION Whenever a character is banished while here, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Chief Tui
flavor_text: "Look at our home! There is no better place to be."

name: Eeyore
text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
flavor_text: "Not much of a roadblock, but I suppose I'll do."

name: Gustav the Giant
text:
ALL TIED UP This character enters play exerted and can't ready at the start of your turn.
BREAK FREE During your turn, whenever one of your other characters banishes another character in a challenge, you may ready this character.

name: Hades
text: CALL THE TITANS {E} — Ready your Titan characters.
flavor_text:
"Brothers! Titans! Look at you in your squalid prison.
Who put you down there?"

name: Helga Sinclair
text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
flavor_text: "That was an order, not a suggestion. Let's go!"

name: John Silver
text: CHART YOUR OWN COURSE For each location you have in play, this character gains Resist +1 and gets +1 {L}. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
flavor_text: "I was never much good at games. Always hated to lose."

name: Kida
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavor_text: She's seen strange things before, but nothing like this.

name: Little John
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Little John.)
OKAY, BIG SHOT While this character is exerted, your characters with Bodyguard gain Resist +1 and get +1 {L}. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

name: Little John
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
DISGUISED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Lythos
text:
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
STONE SKIN {E} — Chosen character gains Resist +2 this turn.
